languages.text: Младший офицер в обход положенной процедуры добивается встречи с Лорд-капитаном. Речь идет о проблеме, затрагивающей как нижний палубы, так и высший офицерский состав — сенешаля Версериана. Ситуация необычна и требует вмешательства Вольного Торговца.

A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Младший офицер в обход положенной процедуры добивается встречи с Лорд-капитаном. Речь идет о проблеме, затрагивающей как нижний палубы, так и высший офицерский состав — сенешаля Версериана. Ситуация необычна и требует вмешательства Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 一名低级军官违背了标准流程，执意要与领主舰长见面。船上发生的问题既影响到了下层甲板，又涉及到了军阶最高的韦尔森总领。这样的事情很不寻常，需要行商浪人亲自进行处理。
languages.original_text: A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 一名低级军官违背了标准流程，执意要与领主舰长见面。船上发生的问题既影响到了下层甲板，又涉及到了军阶最高的韦尔森总领。这样的事情很不寻常，需要行商浪人亲自进行处理。

languages.text: 下級士官がロード・キャプテンとの謁見を安全に行うための標準的な手順を破った。船内で問題が発生し、下層デッキと最高位士官である家令長ウェルザリアンの両方に影響が及ぶこととなった。この状況は異常であるため、自由開拓者の介入が必要だ。
languages.original_text: A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 下級士官がロード・キャプテンとの謁見を安全に行うための標準的な手順を破った。船内で問題が発生し、下層デッキと最高位士官である家令長ウェルザリアンの両方に影響が及ぶこととなった。この状況は異常であるため、自由開拓者の介入が必要だ。

languages.text: Una oficial de bajo rango altera el protocolo convencional para obtener una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán: hay un problema a bordo que afecta tanto a las cubiertas inferiores como al oficial de mayor rango de la nave, el Senescal Werserian. Hace falta que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente intervenga en el asunto.
languages.original_text: A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Una oficial de bajo rango altera el protocolo convencional para obtener una audiencia con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán: hay un problema a bordo que afecta tanto a las cubiertas inferiores como al oficial de mayor rango de la nave, el Senescal Werserian. Hace falta que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente intervenga en el asunto.

languages.text: Ein Junior-Offizier umgeht das Standardprotokoll, um eine Audienz beim Lord Captain zu erhalten. Offenbar gibt es an Bord ein Problem, das die unteren Decks und den hochrangigsten Offizier, Truchsess Werserian, betrifft. Die Situation ist ungewöhnlich und erfordert das Eingreifen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Ein Junior-Offizier umgeht das Standardprotokoll, um eine Audienz beim Lord Captain zu erhalten. Offenbar gibt es an Bord ein Problem, das die unteren Decks und den hochrangigsten Offizier, Truchsess Werserian, betrifft. Die Situation ist ungewöhnlich und erfordert das Eingreifen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.

languages.text: Un jeune officier enfreint le protocole pour se garantir une audience avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} : il semble y avoir un problème lié aux ponts inférieurs et à un officier supérieur, le sénéchal Werserian. La situation est très inhabituelle et nécessite l'intervention {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Un jeune officier enfreint le protocole pour se garantir une audience avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} : il semble y avoir un problème lié aux ponts inférieurs et à un officier supérieur, le sénéchal Werserian. La situation est très inhabituelle et nécessite l'intervention {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: Kıdemsiz bir subay, Lord Kaptan'la görüşmek için standart protokolü bozdu. Gemide alt güverteleri ve en yüksek rütbeli subay olan Seneşal Werserian'ı etkileyen bir sorun var. Bu alışılmadık durum, Hür Tacir'in müdahalesini gerektiriyor.
languages.original_text: A junior officer subverts standard protocol to secure an audience with the Lord Captain — there is a problem on board affecting both the lower decks and the highest-ranked officer, Seneschal Werserian. The situation is unusual and requires the intervention of the Rogue Trader.
